message.name: ERR_HEARING_FV_DATETIME
message.locale: A date and time for the hearing must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_FV_ADDRESS
message.locale: For a home based hearing the address on which the hearing will take place must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_FV_TYPECODE
message.locale: The type of hearing must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_FV_ADDRESS_INVALID
message.locale: A valid address must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_FV_LOCATION
message.locale: For a court room based hearing the location where the hearing is to take place must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_FV_LOCATION_INVALID
message.locale: A valid location must be specified.

message.name: INF_COMPLETE_HEARING_TASK_SUBJECT
message.locale: Complete Hearing.

message.name: ERR_USERNAME_INVALID
message.locale: A valid user must be selected.

message.name: ERR_USERNAME_EXISTS
message.locale: This user has already been invited to the hearing.

message.name: INF_HEARING_ACTIVITY_SUBJECT
message.locale: Hearing Activity.

message.name: INF_HEARING_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Hearing Notification.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_FV_STARTENDTIME
message.locale: The hearing start time must be before the hearing end time.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_FV_STARTTIME
message.locale: You can only update the actual hearing start date for a completed or adjourned hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_FV_ENDTIME
message.locale: You can only update the actual hearing end date for a completed or continued hearing.

message.name: ERR_XFV_HEARING_CONTINUE_DATE
message.locale: The date specified must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_FV_HEARING_CONTINUE_REASON
message.locale: Reason for continuance must be provided.

message.name: ERR_READ_POSTPONE_IMPROPER_USAGE
message.locale: An unexpected hearing status was detected. Please contact your Administrator.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_FV_POSTPONE_DATETIME
message.locale: The date requested must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_STATUS
message.locale: Can only complete a scheduled hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_START_TIME
message.locale: Actual start time of the hearing must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_END_TIME
message.locale: Actual end time of the hearing must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_START_TIME_BEFORE_END_TIME
message.locale: Actual start time of the hearing must be before the actual end time.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_COMPLETE_DATE
message.locale: Hearing can only be completed on or after the scheduled date of the hearing.

message.name: INF_HEARING_TRANSCRIPTION_REASON
message.locale: Hearing has been completed.

message.name: INF_HEARING_TRANSCRIPTION_SUBJECT
message.locale: A copy of the hearing transcription should be sent to the requester.

message.name: ERR_COMPLETE_HEARING_TYPE
message.locale: Appeal type is invalid.

message.name: INF_HEARING_COMPLETED_COMMENTS
message.locale: Hearing has been completed.

message.name: INF_HEARING_COMPLETED_SUBJECT
message.locale: Hearing completed.

message.name: INF_HEARING_REVIEW_COMPLETED_COMMENTS
message.locale: Make appeal decision.

message.name: INF_HEARING_REVIEW_COMPLETED_SUBJECT
message.locale: Hearing has been completed.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGATTENDANCE_TYPE_INVALID
message.locale: Hearing attendee type is invalid.

message.name: INF_HEARING_ADJOURNED_COMMENTS
message.locale: A hearing needs to be scheduled for the case

message.name: INF_HEARING_ADJOURNED_SUBJECT
message.locale: Schedule a hearing

message.name: INF_ADJOURN_HEARING_TRANSCRIPTION_REASON
message.locale: Hearing has been adjourned.

message.name: INF_ADJOURN_HEARING_TRANSCRIPTION_SUBJECT
message.locale: A copy of the hearing transcript should be sent to the requester.

message.name: ERR_ADJOURN_HEARING_STATUS
message.locale: Can only adjourn a scheduled hearing.

message.name: ERR_FV_ADJOURN_DATE
message.locale: Hearing can only be adjourned on or after the scheduled date of the hearing.

message.name: ERR_FV_ADJOURN_ACTUAL_START_DATE_TIME
message.locale: Actual start time of the hearing must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_ADJOURN_ACTUAL_END_DATE_TIME
message.locale: Actual end time of the hearing must be specified.

message.name: ERR_ADJOURN_START_TIME_BEFORE_END_TIME
message.locale: Actual start time of the hearing must be before the actual end time.

message.name: ERR_FV_ADJOURN_REASON_CODE
message.locale: Reason for the adjournment must be specified.
